plot: Demonstrate Once, Imitate Immediately (DOME): Learning Visual Servoing for One-Shot Imitation Learning
summary: DOME is a novel method for one-shot imitation learning, where a task can be learned from just a single demonstration and then be deployed immediately. DOME does not require prior task or object knowledge, and can perform the task in novel object configurations and with distractors. They show that DOME achieves near 100% success rate on 7 real-world everyday tasks, and they perform several studies to thoroughly understand each individual component of DOME to understand each component of the DOME system.
